==Profile==
Gordes is an inmate of the Fortress of Meropide and a member of the Mutual Aid Network. He explains to the Traveler the history of the Mutual Aid Network. Also he was one of the members who suppressed [[Domenico]]'s failed rebellion against Neuvillette.
